lead_paragraph: Workers in hard hats and coveralls were still working on Rio de Janeiro's newest subway line on Monday, two days after it was inaugurated by Brazilian leaders and four days before the start of the 2016 Olympics it was built to serve.

headline.print_headline: Work Still Going On as Rio Metro Extension Opens
headline.main: Work Still Going On as Rio Metro Extension Opens
